reg:regulation.reg:title:
Additional Municipal Powers -
Aeronautics Act Agreements Regulation

bcl:section.bcl:text: This regulation applies to municipalities with which the federal minister responsible for the Aeronautics Act (Canada) wishes to enter into an agreement under section 5.81 of the Aeronautics Act (Canada).

bcl:section.bcl:marginalnote: Authority to enter into agreement and exercise powers
bcl:section.bcl:text: A municipality referred to in section 1 may

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: enter into agreements under section 5.81 of the Aeronautics Act (Canada) in relation to lands within the municipality, and
exercise powers to regulate, prohibit and impose requirements in relation to matters covered by the agreement, to the extent and in the manner contemplated by the agreement.

reg:content.reg:provisionsnote: [Provisions of the Community Charter, S.B.C. 2003, c. 26, relevant to the enactment of this regulation: section 281]
